title: [Large-Scale] Effectiveness Improvement Process for Blended Learning-Based e-Learning Mathematics Content Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Designing and applying customized e-learning content considering characteristics of urban and rural learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of e-learning content design in a blended learning environment.
Learners can produce three or more types of e-learning activity materials tailored to target regions (urban/rural) and mathematical characteristics.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the effectiveness (satisfaction, motivation, learning achievement) of content designed through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
